articles.description: This vibrant beet smoothie combines sweet and earthy beets with berries, banana and orange juice for a well-balanced flavor.
articles.content: Combine strawberries, blueberries, orange juice, beets, banana, carrot and ginger in a blender; process until combined, about 30 seconds. Divide between 2 glasses. Serve immediately.
